text: Iván Massagué Horta (born 4 September 1976) is a Spanish actor. He is best known worldwide for his role as Goreng in the movie The Platform (2019). He has appeared in many television shows such as 7 vidas, La familia Mata, El barco and Gym Tony. His other movie credits include Pan's Labyrinth (2006) and Pancho, el perro millonario (2014). Massagué was born in Barcelona, Catalonia. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish television actors Category:Actors from Barcelona
title: Iván Massagué
